name: Ice Hockey Tap Champions: Extreme Ice Maniacs
name_original: Ice Hockey Tap Champions: Extreme Ice Maniacs
description:
Ice Hockey Tap Champions is a simple single touch tap game. The game feature ice hockey players in 2 different colors green and blue.

You can tap on left or right of the screen to pass the puck to the next player standing on the left or right. Each time you tap on screen the puck would be passed on to the next player depending upon which side you have touched.

The player would be playing with the green team. What you have to do is that you tap on the screen to pass the ice hockey puck to next player of green team and make sure you don't accidentally send it to the red team player.

Gameplay mechanics are extremely simple but you might wanna keep your touch in check if you are trying to get a highscore.

You have a limited time to go for the highscore. The faster you tap the more time you will get. Each time you tap successfully, you get a bit more time at your hand.

Try to get as high as possible and compete with your family and friends or the rest of the world and show them what you are made of. Yolo!
